about_the_game:
Endlessly protect an ending universe

Battle swarms of enemies and thwart their attempts to harvest souls by completing procedural objectives before the planet's time runs out in this endless top-down action rogue-lite! Colorful biomes with vicious threats await you -- each with fully randomized traits, weather, and enemy types. Each run uncovers lore and secrets about the universe and its Voyagers.

Make or break the laws of physics

Collect relics and stack their effects infinitely. Trade with the Drifter between stages to maximize your build. Some relics provide passive effects, others help you demolish everything on screen. Defeating powerful bosses grants cards with the power to defy fate and change the very rules of the game, from altering spawn rates to doubling relic effects.

No Voyage is the Same

Master one of the chosen elemental Voyagers, then master them some more! Remix fighting styles and abilities by fine-tuning their values with loadouts and never playing the same way again. Defeat bosses for a chance to claim their abilities -- combine them with your own to clear waves in seconds.

Features

  • 8+ Planets: All with night/day and aesthetic variants randomized every stage

  • Infinitely Scaling Challenges: Battle for as long as you (or your PC) can keep up

  • A High-Skill Bullet Hell: Balance pure luck with carefully placed ability usage to incinerate hordes of enemies.

  • 10+ Random Objective Types: From Hivemind to Exterminate -- Every stage offers a random selection of objectives that scale endlessly.

Discord

Join our Disord to contribute to the game with your feedback and ideas, or chat with the community.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tear through hordes of otherworldly creatures and defeat their ruler before the universe ends. Travel between planets, gather powerful relics, and shape the galaxy to your whim in this objective-based action rogue-lite.
